# Contributing Guide

Thanks for your interest in contributing — we appreciate your time!

## How to Contribute
1. Fork the repository
2. Create a feature branch with a descriptive name
3. Make clear, focused commits
4. Open a Pull Request with a helpful description

## Development Setup
- Follow the instructions in the project README to run services locally
- Ensure backend, frontend, and agent components start successfully
- Add tests or logs where appropriate

## Guidelines
- Keep code clean and consistent with the project style
- Write clear commit messages and PR descriptions
- Avoid breaking changes without prior discussion

## Reporting Bugs
- Describe the issue clearly and include reproduction steps
- Attach logs, screenshots, or relevant files when possible

## Questions
If you’re unsure, open an issue or reach out at ashmitkumar1020@gmail.com

We’re happy to help and review contributions.
